name: Forest Of Glass
description:
Progress updates on Tumblr

The demo currently includes 1 character illustration, an introduction to both love interests and roughly 20,000 words.

Forest Of Glass is an interactive fantasy romance visual novel with two romance options 1 male and 1 female.  Play as a nameable non-binary protagonist trying to stay safe in a world of monsters and magic.  The demo includes 1 character illustration, an introduction to both love interests and roughly 20,000 words.

The full game will include customisable pronouns, multiple illustrations, roughly 10 chapters and multiple endings.

  Juno

A lively and colourful avian, Juno is eager to help the protagonist survive in the world of monsters.

 

Rook

 A mysterious entity that runs The Birds Nest, a bar dedicated to giving cryptids a safe place from humans.
